meanings.definition: scryers: people who practice divination by gazing into a crystal ball or other reflective surface
meanings.sent1: The scryers peered into the crystal ball to see what the future held.
meanings.sent2: The village scryers were known for their accurate predictions.
meanings.sent3: The scryers had a crystal ball that always seemed to show funny images.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a scryer, reflecting the visions of what was yet to come.
meanings.sent5: The scryers' crystal ball shimmered with mysterious visions of the unknown.

meanings.definition: scryers: those who use clairvoyance or other psychic abilities to see the future
meanings.sent1: The scryers claimed to have visions of events before they happened.
meanings.sent2: Many believe that scryers possess a special gift to see beyond the present.
meanings.sent3: The scryers' predictions were so accurate, it was almost like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition acted as a scryer, revealing hidden truths to her.
meanings.sent5: The scryers' abilities to foresee the future left others in awe.
